metadata.description: Private Claude Code plugins for CAD and automation workflows

plugins.name: ai-cad-fusion
plugins.description: AI-powered CAD automation for Autodesk Fusion. Claude-assisted sheet metal design, parametric modeling, and geometry preparation.

plugins.name: arbor
plugins.description: Graph-native code intelligence using arbor. Semantic code graphs for understanding relationships, impact analysis, and safe refactoring.

plugins.name: inworld-tts
plugins.description: Per-project TTS voice notifications using Inworld AI. Each project gets a distinct auto-assigned voice so you can tell terminals apart by ear.
